_comment: Full session configuration template for power users
_usage: Merge these fields into cowork_settings.json in your session directory
_slashCommands_note: Add custom slash commands here - they map to skills
_userApprovedFileAccessPaths_note: Pre-approve file access to skip permission prompts
_enabledMcpTools_note: Set tool-hash: true/false to enable/disable specific MCP tools
